author: ASIER DE MIGUEL

comments.message: Yup, it is about the awareness of sustainability. All of us should pay more attention to the awareness of environment around us and try to balance the development of society and issues from environment. It means that we need to find an optimal way to balance them in order to develop sustainably.

description:
Why all the catastrophes of the world normally happen in undeveloped countries? Is because of that, because they are un-developed. Why are undeveloped? They are because we are developed, it’s as clear as that. Now that we have seen that the problem can affect us we are worried.

If we try to build a balanced world in the future by educating our sons in a respectful live stile and we change our selfish way of acting in the future the reaction to a big problem like Ebola will have a faster reaction.  

What we could do for the next time? Start fighting the problem when it appears, in Africa.
summary: We are acting in a selfish way
title: What can we do to fight Ebola?
